item.title: ‘DAU’ Director-Artist Ilya Khrzhanovskiy to Be Feted at the 31st Sarajevo Film Festival
item.description: Director-artist Ilya Khrzhanovskiy, best known for the “DAU” project, will be the subject of the “Tribute To” program at the 31st Sarajevo Film Festival, with a curated retrospective of his films. Khr
